name: Santa Mahjong Solitaire Pro
description:
Have fun with Christmas inspired mahjong game. Lively & beautiful mahjong tiles!

Hop into the Christmas spirit with the wonderful mahjong games inspired Christmas Mahjong Santa. The classic solitaire matching cards game is here again to accompany you in a beautiful Christmas holiday New Year’s theme. Santa and many other items are awaiting your matching and thinking skills in a beautifully packed mahjong Christmas game. Happy xmas solitaire mahjong gaming!

CAREFULLY DESIGNED, BEAUTIFUL AND INSPIRING

We love mahjong games, so when we first started to create this lovely mahjongg tiles game, we knew we need to do something special. Days of hard work are put into each icon and drawing. The gameplay is made to be effortless for the players. You’ll love it!

GREAT CONTROL OPTIONS – 10+ LEVELS AVAILABLE

The game’s interface is clean and there are useful control features like undo and reshuffle to pass the level. Currently there are 10 levels available, try to complete them with all stars if you want to be the real mahjong master. Alternatively, you can invite your Facebook to play the game or share your results!

CLASSIC MAHJONG, BUT EVEN MORE INTERESTING

The mahjong board is huge and you need to show great strategy to finish it off in the fastest way possible. Things will not be easy, especially in the later stages. But, one thing is certain! If you love this type of freecell, solitaire cards games, you will surely be hooked to our mahjong card Christmas inspired game.

PERFECT FOR ALL AGES

We all know that mahjong 3d tiles games are ideal for any age. It can be the Christmas game for kids that will get them entertained, or your new mahjongg addiction! One thing is assured, you will definitely have fun with this card matching game.

CHRISTMAS MAHJONG SANTA FEATURES:

* Beautiful mahjong Christmas theme
* Unique artwork
* Intuitive gameplay and controls
* undo and reshuffle
* Facebook invite and Facebook share available
* Challenging, with progressive difficulty
* Game for all ages

………………………………………………………………………..

Fun freecell, solitaire game based on Christmas mahjong.
Enjoy it alone or play it with your kids
Get this lovely mahjongg gaming experience.
